description: In this edition: Watching 2020 as a super-engaged Trump (and Biden) voter, watching the legal battles over stay-at-home orders, and watching what happens to New York’s presidential primary, which may or may not happen.
source.name: The Washington Post

title: The familiar stench of the Justice Department’s Michael Flynn decision
description: For the second time, Trump has obtained a reversal from his own Justice Department when it comes to the prosecution of a key ally. And in both cases, Trump sought the action publicly.

title: Biden virtual Tampa rally runs into glitches, awkwardness and blank screens
description: Joe Biden, the most personal of campaigners, is restricted to holding rallies from 1,000 miles away. An event on Thursday event showcased the perils.
content:
This was an event Thursday billed as a Virtual Rally with Joe Biden in Tampa. It was an hour plagued by technical glitches, awkward pauses, delays and even some blank screen time.
For a campaign seeking a substitute for the rousing events that Biden would be… [+7804 chars]
